I'm Marco Gullo, I live in Palermo, in Sicily.
I'm learning Android programming at Google Design Group in Palermo, attending online course at Udacity.
At the moment this is a small app which uses basic Android technology but I think it's likely to grow to be a serious app.
Try and enjoy it!

This app needs only READ CONTACTS permission. The app manage contacts that have a phone number and retrieve other data such postal address, mail address, call count and last time called. I coded for using the Local SQLite Database. The app can, required by user in the option menu:
 : store data into the database (also on first run).
 : present contacts sorted by name.
 : present contacts by last time called.
 : present contacts by most called.
Choosed details can be SHARED in a text fashion using, a IM, MAIL client and so on, chosen by user.
